Articles.Content:
So after a handful of tries and a trip to eve, I have landed on the moon!

[ATTACH=CONFIG]33780[/ATTACH][ATTACH=CONFIG]33781[/ATTACH]

Of course with mixed results.

Suggestions for rescue mission needed.

On a better side, The Module does do barrelrolls and backflips, Atleast they will have something to do.
At least your capsule isn't still bouncing and spinning uncontrollably down a hill on Minmus... It's hard to rescue people from that situation...
So we can finally include the Mun as part of Planet Express delivery?
